summary: The document is a personnel record detailing Joseph S. Piccolo's request for an overseas assignment under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992. It includes his personal and professional details, such as his birth date, grade (GS-12), current position, and proposed assignment to JMCOBRA in Managua, Nicaragua, with a departure date of 11 Oct 68. The document also covers medical and security clearance approvals, showcasing the thorough evaluation process for overseas assignments.
key_findings: Joseph S. Piccolo, a GS-12 grade employee, was approved for an overseas assignment.
This document was released under the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992.
Piccolo's assignment was to JMCOBRA in Managua, Nicaragua, with a proposed departure date of 11 Oct 68.
The request process included medical and security clearance approvals, highlighting the comprehensive evaluation for overseas assignments.
keywords: President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992
